data.name: InvalidMaxConcurrentDownloads
data.comment: Validation error for max concurrent downloads. {0} is the invalid value

data.name: InvalidDownloadBufferSize
data.comment: Validation error for download buffer size. {0} is the invalid value

data.name: PathDoesNotExist
data.value: Preferred game install path does not exist: {0}
data.comment: Validation warning when specified path doesn't exist. {0} is the path

data.name: SettingsDirectoryDoesNotExist
data.value: Settings file directory does not exist: {0}
data.comment: Validation warning when settings directory doesn't exist. {0} is the directory

data.name: ConcurrentDownloadsOutOfRange
data.value: Concurrent downloads must be between {0} and {1}
data.comment: Validation error for concurrent downloads range. {0} is min, {1} is max

data.name: DownloadTimeoutOutOfRange
data.value: Download timeout must be between {0} and {1} seconds
data.comment: Validation error for download timeout range. {0} is min seconds, {1} is max seconds

data.name: BufferSizeOutOfRange
data.value: Buffer size must be between {0} and {1} KB
data.comment: Validation error for buffer size range. {0} is min KB, {1} is max KB

data.name: ValueTooLow
data.comment: Validation error when value is below minimum. {0} is the minimum value

data.name: ValueTooHigh
data.comment: Validation error when value is above maximum. {0} is the maximum value

data.name: InvalidCultureName
data.comment: Error when culture name is invalid. {0} is the culture name

data.name: CultureNotAvailable
data.value: Culture '{0}' is not available. Falling back to '{1}'
data.comment: Warning when culture is not available. {0} is requested culture, {1} is fallback

data.name: CultureNotFound
data.value: Culture '{0}' not found. Using invariant culture
data.comment: Warning when culture is not found. {0} is the culture name

data.name: SelectGameInstallation
data.comment: Validation error when no game installation is selected

data.name: EnterProfileName
data.comment: Validation error when profile name is empty

data.name: GameInstallationRequired
data.value: A Game Installation must be enabled for the profile to be launchable.
data.comment: Validation error when no game installation is enabled
